HDG.LOG.content: a protection in which what lies before remains (bleibt) laid down: stored, laid away, secured & deposited in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), sheltered in unconcealment > the keisthai of upokeimenon: presencing (Anwesen) of that which lies before us into unconcealment: legein concerns safety (Geborgenheit), safekeeping, gathering appropriate to such a laying [what about annihilation?], safety of that which comes together into presence (des beisammen-Anwesenden)

HDG.LOG.content: [method of plurivocity? compare to Derrida, dissemination] succeed in delineating more meaningfully a few characteristics of en and panta: delineation should remain a preliminary free-flowing sketch, not self-assured portrayal > must reflect w/in unity of Heraclitus’ saying [closed-context?]

HDG.LOG.content: thinking changes the world, changes world in ever darker depths of a riddle (Rätsel) > riddle propounded (zugesagt) to us [for a long time] in word “Being” > Being remains only the provisional (vorläufige) word [Being originally called “presencing (Anwesen),” enduring-here-before in unconcealment (her-vor-währen in die Unverborgenheit)] [truth and security, Wahrheit]

HDG.BC.content: [almost Freudian] unrest as the surge of mere life revealing itself, to remain thrust/forced into its own craving belongs to essence of living [conatus] > man over animal can elevate living/craving into guiding measure, make it the “principle” of “progress” [Kant]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.BC.linkedContent: [almost Freudian] unrest as the surge of mere life revealing itself, to remain thrust/forced into its own craving belongs to essence of living [conatus] > man over animal can elevate living/craving into guiding measure, make it the “principle” of “progress” [Kant]

HDG.BC.content: reflection saves us, inner choice (innere Wahl): what alone remains essence comes into view almost (fast) of itself [causa sui?], attend to what we can do w/out, choose whether or not to expose (ausgesetzt) ourselves to claim essential (Anspruch des Wesenhaften) makes on us > each person responsible for himself, for his delusions, for that which he holds himself ready
HDG.BC.linkedContent: reflection saves us, inner choice (innere Wahl): what alone remains essence comes into view almost (fast) of itself [causa sui?], attend to what we can do w/out, choose whether or not to expose (ausgesetzt) ourselves to claim essential (Anspruch des Wesenhaften) makes on us > each person responsible for himself, for his delusions, for that which he holds himself ready

HDG.BC.content: we have our residence in the distinction (Unterscheidung) btwn Being/beings [ontological difference] > ontological difference looks negative [isn’t], OD holds differentia apart (hält Unterscheidenes auseinander) [spacing], an extension & expanse, space of all spaces > at first, know nothing of this distinction, of what it consists remains hidden: in fact > whether code word (Kennwortes) “distinction” characterizes its essence remains undecided/unasked > “the distinction” more essential than all differences/oppositions btwn beings
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we have our residence in the distinction (Unterscheidung) btwn Being/beings [ontological difference] > ontological difference looks negative [isn’t], OD holds differentia apart (hält Unterscheidenes auseinander) [spacing], an extension & expanse, space of all spaces > at first, know nothing of this distinction, of what it consists remains hidden: in fact > whether code word (Kennwortes) “distinction” characterizes its essence remains undecided/unasked > “the distinction” more essential than all differences/oppositions btwn beings

HDG.BC.content: Being withholds itself from any grasping on basis of beings, denies itself every concept, every determination, illumination, in every respect for every attempt at an explanation [what about every name???]: thus Being withholds itself, withdraws: self-concealment belongs to being: Being itself “is” concealment ——Being is the most worn-out (Abgegriffenste) > [beings as testimony to Being] lay claim to Being whenever we experience beings > Being expended (in a way) in constant/multiple use in all relation to beings, but Being not used up in expenditure, remains constantly available to us [cf. Open Manifest]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being withholds itself from any grasping on basis of beings, denies itself every concept, every determination, illumination, in every respect for every attempt at an explanation [what about every name???]: thus Being withholds itself, withdraws: self-concealment belongs to being: Being itself “is” concealment ——Being is the most worn-out (Abgegriffenste) > [beings as testimony to Being] lay claim to Being whenever we experience beings > Being expended (in a way) in constant/multiple use in all relation to beings, but Being not used up in expenditure, remains constantly available to us [cf. Open Manifest]

HDG.BC.content: Being as most worn-out coin (abgegriffenste Münze), what is most self-understood, that which we constantly pay for every relation to beings: Being, most worn-out, most indifferent > even when we want Nothing, Being remains, resists expenditure/consumption > in extremity of desired annihilation of all beings, Being must appear [cf. Open Manifest, total annihilation? Being makes annihilation of beings possible]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

Open Manifest, total annihilation? Being makes annihilation of beings possible]

HDG.BC.content: only “beings” remain: what does that mean? > stand btwn 2 equally unavoidable limits: 1) we cast being away from us (das Sein wird von uns verworfen [cf. Freud foreclosure]) when we say Being “is” 2) can never disavow “Being” & “is” wherever we experience a being [“is” method]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: only “beings” remain: what does that mean? > stand btwn 2 equally unavoidable limits: 1) we cast being away from us (das Sein wird von uns verworfen [cf. Freud foreclosure]) when we say Being “is” 2) can never disavow “Being” & “is” wherever we experience a being [“is” method]

HDG.BC.content: in the casting away & toward us don’t wish to capture what opens up in a formal schema of formal thinking [does name Being remain formal???] > impasse stems from Being itself? guidewords indicate a peculiar ambivalence of Being

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.BC.linkedContent: in the casting away & toward us don’t wish to capture what opens up in a formal schema of formal thinking [does name Being remain formal???] > impasse stems from Being itself? guidewords indicate a peculiar ambivalence of Being

HDG.BC.content: remembrance into first inception is fore-thinking into more incipient inception > remembrance is placement into Being itself > Being remains closer to us than everything nearest, farther than all that is farthest > only appear to escape Being in favor & for sake of beings, whose density fills every openness > must become aware of our abode: becoming aware not just raising Being into consciousness [not mindfulness]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.BC.linkedContent: remembrance into first inception is fore-thinking into more incipient inception > remembrance is placement into Being itself > Being remains closer to us than everything nearest, farther than all that is farthest > only appear to escape Being in favor & for sake of beings, whose density fills every openness > must become aware of our abode: becoming aware not just raising Being into consciousness [not mindfulness]

HDG.BC.content: becoming aware of our essential abode in Being: 1st remembrance, impulse to preparation, attending to preparation, preparation for this readiness, readiness for such a change, transformation of humanity re: relation to Being, grasping ground > all this remains preliminary, the preliminary (das Vor-läufige) also an extending-in-advance (ein Voraus-laufen) into a future of history > only initiating/incipient pertains to the future, what is present always is past [slow down] > no haste in incipient, only incipient if it can rest in itself (in sich selbst zu ruhen vermag) [causa sui?], never comes too late, at best too early [Nietzsche]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: becoming aware of our essential abode in Being: 1st remembrance, impulse to preparation, attending to preparation, preparation for this readiness, readiness for such a change, transformation of humanity re: relation to Being, grasping ground > all this remains preliminary, the preliminary (das Vor-läufige) also an extending-in-advance (ein Voraus-laufen) into a future of history > only initiating/incipient pertains to the future, what is present always is past [slow down] > no haste in incipient, only incipient if it can rest in itself (in sich selbst zu ruhen vermag) [causa sui?], never comes too late, at best too early [Nietzsche]

HDG.LA.content: hearing holds back w/its own saying, keeps to itself in listening by which it remains appropriated to the peal of silence [cf. p. 204]

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

HDG.LA.linkedContent: hearing holds back w/its own saying, keeps to itself in listening by which it remains appropriated to the peal of silence [cf. p. 204]

HDG.TB.content: saying of Appropriation in form of a lecture remains itself an obstacle of this kind [metaphysical obstacles that render such saying inadequate] > lecture has spoke merely in propositional statements
HDG.TB.linkedContent: saying of Appropriation in form of a lecture remains itself an obstacle of this kind [metaphysical obstacles that render such saying inadequate] > lecture has spoke merely in propositional statements

HDG.IWM.content: if we adhere to customary usage (of words for Being: einai, esse) betray ourselves as pacemakers (Schrittmacher) of greatest thoughtlessness to have gained currency in human thought, has remained dominant until this moment > essence of presencing deeply concealed in early names for Being
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: if we adhere to customary usage (of words for Being: einai, esse) betray ourselves as pacemakers (Schrittmacher) of greatest thoughtlessness to have gained currency in human thought, has remained dominant until this moment > essence of presencing deeply concealed in early names for Being

HDG.IWM.content: fundamental ontology (attempt to inquire back), like any title, soon seen to be inappropriate [beyond Being then?], misleading because says something correct from point of view of metaphysics > what matters is undertaking transition [not there yet] from metaphysics to recalling truth of Being > thinking that calls itself “fundamental ontology” blocks/obscures its own path by very designation > attempt to recall truth of Being, going back into ground of metaphysics [Destruction], already left realm of all ontology w/ 1st step [was that step ever taken?] > wherever indirect/direct representation of “transcendence” remains: ontology [cf. On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]

On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]

HDG.QB.content: overcoming nihilism not standing outside of nihilism if essence of nihilism isn’t nihilistic, if history of that essence is older and remains younger [than phases of nihilism]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: overcoming nihilism not standing outside of nihilism if essence of nihilism isn’t nihilistic, if history of that essence is older and remains younger [than phases of nihilism]

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.QB.linkedContent: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.QB.content: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]

HDG.QB.content: all Saying [of Being, of overcoming nihilism] proceeds awkwardly: must pass through essential ambiguity (Mehrdeutigkeit) of word, turn of phrase > ambiguity of Saying resides (beruht) in a play, the richer it unfolds, remains all the more rigorously maintained in concealed rule (in einer verborgenen Regel gehalten bleibt) [secret] > supreme law of Saying: freedom that frees us for ever playful jointure (allspielende Gefüge) [why jointure?] of never resting transformation (nie ruhenden Verwandlung)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: all Saying [of Being, of overcoming nihilism] proceeds awkwardly: must pass through essential ambiguity (Mehrdeutigkeit) of word, turn of phrase > ambiguity of Saying resides (beruht) in a play, the richer it unfolds, remains all the more rigorously maintained in concealed rule (in einer verborgenen Regel gehalten bleibt) [secret] > supreme law of Saying: freedom that frees us for ever playful jointure (allspielende Gefüge) [why jointure?] of never resting transformation (nie ruhenden Verwandlung)

HDG.QB.content: Nietzsche (every contemporary thinks/poetizes “for”/“against” him) heard a calling demanding humans to prepare for dominating the earth, not war but polemos that first lets gods, humans, freemen, slaves appear in their essence, leads to a critical encounter of X Being [compared to this encounter, world wars remain superficial (vordergründig)] > did he collapse (stürzte) or take his thinking as far as he was able to go? > this thinking no easier for us: must restrict itself to something precursory (Vorläufigeres): give careful thought to ancient/venerable words whose saying addresses (zuspricht) us to essential realm of nihilism & its recovery (Verwindung) [paleonym]

HDG.QB.content: whereas that which appears must be absolutely valid (cannot remain w/out provenance [ohne Herkunft]), [must have systematic use], there’s no use (Nutzen) [stated affirmatively] in what careful thought is always concerned w/: drawing our attention (aufmerksam) to use of language in thinking (Sprachgebrauch des Denkens)

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.QB.linkedContent: whereas that which appears must be absolutely valid (cannot remain w/out provenance [ohne Herkunft]), [must have systematic use], there’s no use (Nutzen) [stated affirmatively] in what careful thought is always concerned w/: drawing our attention (aufmerksam) to use of language in thinking (Sprachgebrauch des Denkens)

HDG.FS.content: reading Hegel’s “dichotomy (Entzweiung) is the source of the need for philosophy” [Differenz…], Heidegger states that all attempts to suppress “tearing” must be abandoned, “tearing” im Grunde remains and must remain: “in the tearing…there always reigns (waltet) unity or a necessary conjoining (Vereinigung) that is, a living unity”
HDG.FS.linkedContent: reading Hegel’s “dichotomy (Entzweiung) is the source of the need for philosophy” [Differenz…], Heidegger states that all attempts to suppress “tearing” must be abandoned, “tearing” im Grunde remains and must remain: “in the tearing…there always reigns (waltet) unity or a necessary conjoining (Vereinigung) that is, a living unity”

HDG.FS.content: for Kant, power of conjoining withdraws before the Understanding, unity hasn’t disappeared but remains in background > over-interpreting, Reason as faculty of unity, perceiving of Being, withdraws behind Understanding (for Kant): ontological difference is at stake (im Spiel ist) > understanding can’t grasp/determine absolute synthesis

HDG.FS.linkedContent: for Kant, power of conjoining withdraws before the Understanding, unity hasn’t disappeared but remains in background > over-interpreting, Reason as faculty of unity, perceiving of Being, withdraws behind Understanding (for Kant): ontological difference is at stake (im Spiel ist) > understanding can’t grasp/determine absolute synthesis

HDG.FS.content: reality of America veiled from view of those interested: collusion btwn industry/military > decision does not belong to humans, w/out this insight (man not a being that makes himself [contra Sartrean existentialism?]), sd remain w/in political opposition of civil/industrial society > society (Gesellschaft): a mirror/extension of subjectivity
HDG.FS.linkedContent: reality of America veiled from view of those interested: collusion btwn industry/military > decision does not belong to humans, w/out this insight (man not a being that makes himself [contra Sartrean existentialism?]), sd remain w/in political opposition of civil/industrial society > society (Gesellschaft): a mirror/extension of subjectivity

HDG.FS.content: subjectivity itself not questioned re: its being > since Descartes, subjectivity is fundamentum inconcussum, the barrier to unfolding Seinsfrage ——the “making-present-to-oneself (Selbstvergegenwärtigung)” of consciousness takes place in immanence, what I am conscious of is present to me, in my consciousness > in Being and Time, “thing” no longer in consciousness, but in the world > despite intentionality, Husserl remains trapped in immanence: Husserl retrieves proper consistency of object, saves object, but by situating it in immanence of consciousness
HDG.FS.linkedContent: subjectivity itself not questioned re: its being > since Descartes, subjectivity is fundamentum inconcussum, the barrier to unfolding Seinsfrage ——the “making-present-to-oneself (Selbstvergegenwärtigung)” of consciousness takes place in immanence, what I am conscious of is present to me, in my consciousness > in Being and Time, “thing” no longer in consciousness, but in the world > despite intentionality, Husserl remains trapped in immanence: Husserl retrieves proper consistency of object, saves object, but by situating it in immanence of consciousness

HDG.MA.content: releasement (Gelassenheit) toward things: “yes” & “no” to technology, let devices into our life but remain dependent on something highter

HDG.CCP.content: non-willing: 1) willingly to renounce willing 2) what remains absolutely outside any kind of will > these 2 stand in definite relation to each other > what moves our conversation claims my attention, challenges me

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.CCP.content: waiting (warten) is not awaiting (erwarten): done waiting when we represent what we are waiting for > remaining is a returning > openness itself is Gegnet, into which we’re released by waiting when we think > thinking: coming-into-the-nearness of distance > how come you suddenly could wait?

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.CCP.linkedContent: waiting (warten) is not awaiting (erwarten): done waiting when we represent what we are waiting for > remaining is a returning > openness itself is Gegnet, into which we’re released by waiting when we think > thinking: coming-into-the-nearness of distance > how come you suddenly could wait?

HDG.CCP.content: (only an assertion re: relation of truth to man) truth remains independent of man: Gegnet uses man’s nature (Gelassenheit to Gegnet) w/ respect to man and to sustain determining [of things] [Schelling on independence in Investiga…Human Freedom] > man is he who’s made use of nature of truth
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: (only an assertion re: relation of truth to man) truth remains independent of man: Gegnet uses man’s nature (Gelassenheit to Gegnet) w/ respect to man and to sustain determining [of things] [Schelling on independence in Investiga…Human Freedom] > man is he who’s made use of nature of truth

HDG.CCP.content: coming near & remaining distant from Gegnet > such remaining is a returning > Gegnet would be nearing & distancing > Genet itself: nearness of distance, distance of nearness
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: coming near & remaining distant from Gegnet > such remaining is a returning > Gegnet would be nearing & distancing > Genet itself: nearness of distance, distance of nearness

HDG.CCP.content: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called

HDG.DL.content: [on “language is the house of Being”] gives a hint (Wink) of nature of language > you’ve just said a freeing word (lösendes Wort) > Dann wäre der Wink der Grundzug des Wortes [the hint as the basic character of the word > but, p. 25 don’t let notion of hinting become guiding concept (Leitbegriff) (then we bundle up everything)] > Japaner senses (spüre) [trace] a kinship btwn phrase & a Japanese word [Koto ba, but at this point, remains unnamed]

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.DL.content: two-fold has already offered itself (sich angeboten) to man, though its nature remains veiled > man, insofern er Mensch ist, listens (hört) to this message > man is used for hearing it > man stands in a relation > relation is called hermeneutical: brings tidings (Kunde) of message

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.DL.content: Heidegger remains sparing in words that would lead to a discussion (erörtern) of Sage, would call for a journey (Wanderung) into the Ortschaft of the essence of Sage > what prompts his reserve (Züruckhaltung), insight into the untouchable (Unantastbare), veiled from us by the Geheimnis of Sage [arrive at site of Sage or never arrive?]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.DL.linkedContent: Heidegger remains sparing in words that would lead to a discussion (erörtern) of Sage, would call for a journey (Wanderung) into the Ortschaft of the essence of Sage > what prompts his reserve (Züruckhaltung), insight into the untouchable (Unantastbare), veiled from us by the Geheimnis of Sage [arrive at site of Sage or never arrive?]

HDG.DL.content: [on dialogue, that it must always remain coming, never arrive, and there will be much silence, but not the obnoxiousness of talking about silence]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [on dialogue, that it must always remain coming, never arrive, and there will be much silence, but not the obnoxiousness of talking about silence]

HDG.LP.content: poet’s statement remains unspoken, from its site rise waves, moving the Saying, each wave causes movement of Saying to flow back into ever more hidden source (verhüllteren Ursprung) > from metaphysical-aesthetic point of view: the site/source of wave holds (birgt) w/in hidden nature of what first appears as rhythm
HDG.LP.linkedContent: poet’s statement remains unspoken, from its site rise waves, moving the Saying, each wave causes movement of Saying to flow back into ever more hidden source (verhüllteren Ursprung) > from metaphysical-aesthetic point of view: the site/source of wave holds (birgt) w/in hidden nature of what first appears as rhythm

HDG.LP.content: strange “fremd”: Old High German fram, “forward to somewhere else (anderswohin vorwärts), underway toward (unterwegs nach),” dem Voraufbehaltenen entgegen > strange searches for site where can remain in its wandering: barely exposed to itself, still follows the call of the way to its own

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.LP.linkedContent: strange “fremd”: Old High German fram, “forward to somewhere else (anderswohin vorwärts), underway toward (unterwegs nach),” dem Voraufbehaltenen entgegen > strange searches for site where can remain in its wandering: barely exposed to itself, still follows the call of the way to its own

HDG.LP.content: poet’s work is only a listening, it’s language becomes a saying after (nachsagenden) > poetry’s spoken word guards Gedicht, as that which remains, essential in it, unspoken > when the saying-after must listen, becomes more pious, i.e. fügsamer gegenüber dem Zuspruch des Pfades [more fittingly submissive re: the promptings of the path] [traces?]

HDG.WL.content: ability to speak marks (zeichnet) man as man, this mark (Aus-Zeichnung) contains (enthält) the design (Aufriss) of man’s essence > language grants to man is foundation of human being, he can speak in terms of “it is” (often remains unspoken)

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: ability to speak marks (zeichnet) man as man, this mark (Aus-Zeichnung) contains (enthält) the design (Aufriss) of man’s essence > language grants to man is foundation of human being, he can speak in terms of “it is” (often remains unspoken)

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself

HDG.WL.content: diversity of elements in language, an original count (Zählen) not yet enumerable, a belonging together shows itself (ergab sich) > the count is a recounting that anticipates (auf vorblickt) the Einigende im Zusammengëhoren, but can’t make it appear > long history of inability to experience unifying unity of Sprachwesens, thus it remains w/out a name

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.WL.content: Aufriss of language will remain veiled if we don’t properly attend (eigens beachten) to spoken/unspoken [so we can arrive beyond the veil?]

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.WL.linkedContent: Aufriss of language will remain veiled if we don’t properly attend (eigens beachten) to spoken/unspoken [so we can arrive beyond the veil?]

HDG.WL.content: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable
HDG.WL.linkedContent: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable

HDG.WL.content: even w/out organs, language speaks (Sprache spricht) > language speaks by saying, i.e. showing > this is how language speaks: language as showing, reaches into all regions of presences (Anwesens), summoning what is present (Anwesendes) to appear & fade > what language says (Sagen) wells up (entquillt) from what has been said and the still remaining unsaid Sage, which pervades (durchzieht) the Aufriss des Sprachwesens

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: even w/out organs, language speaks (Sprache spricht) > language speaks by saying, i.e. showing > this is how language speaks: language as showing, reaches into all regions of presences (Anwesens), summoning what is present (Anwesendes) to appear & fade > what language says (Sagen) wells up (entquillt) from what has been said and the still remaining unsaid Sage, which pervades (durchzieht) the Aufriss des Sprachwesens

HDG.TC.content: deliberately speaking of annihilation (Vernichtung), not just destruction (Zerstörung): annihilation is the more encompassing (umfassendere) destruction (also takes into account destruction of countless lives) > can only speak of annihilation by intimations (Andeutungen), point away from what is not meant > annihilation not the highest grade of destruction but essentially other (wesenhaft anderes) than destruction > always something left over w/ destruction, no “remainderless (restlose)” destruction > there is no annihilation at all: the destruction where nothing left remaining, this remainder (Übrig) is nothing: has consumed (aufgezehrt) every “is” & itself > from destruction to annihilation, a change of condition, leap into another essence > not only nothing still left remaining in annihilation, but something, and only, of its own arises (entsteht)

HDG.EC.content: too deplorable [?] to waste a complaint (Klage) on blinded leading-astray of our own people, the devastation of our native soul > the men had decided to remain silent about this devastation (Verwüstung), which existed for a long time, & can’t be reduced to a visible enumeration—not the result of instances of human death

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.EC.linkedContent: too deplorable [?] to waste a complaint (Klage) on blinded leading-astray of our own people, the devastation of our native soul > the men had decided to remain silent about this devastation (Verwüstung), which existed for a long time, & can’t be reduced to a visible enumeration—not the result of instances of human death

HDG.EC.content: could be that morality, w/ its visions of world order, is a monstrous offspring (Ausgeburt) of evil, & the much-appealed-to (vielberufene) Weltöffentlichkeit (word’s general public) remains in essence a construct (Gebild) and product (Erzeugnis) of devastation

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.EC.linkedContent: could be that morality, w/ its visions of world order, is a monstrous offspring (Ausgeburt) of evil, & the much-appealed-to (vielberufene) Weltöffentlichkeit (word’s general public) remains in essence a construct (Gebild) and product (Erzeugnis) of devastation

HDG.EC.content: Nietzsche interpreted morality, the Platonic-Christian ethical doctrine, & its later secularized forms (rational Ethics of Enlightenment/socialism), as appearances (Erscheinungen) of will to power > Nietzsche didn’t realize that a will to power “beyond good & evil,” as realm of pure will to power, remains only counter-world (Gegenwelt) to Platonism > Nietzsche’s doctrine of “discipline and breeding (Zucht und Züchtung)” is extreme affirmation of morality > if will is evil, will to power is least of all beyond evil

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.EC.linkedContent: Nietzsche interpreted morality, the Platonic-Christian ethical doctrine, & its later secularized forms (rational Ethics of Enlightenment/socialism), as appearances (Erscheinungen) of will to power > Nietzsche didn’t realize that a will to power “beyond good & evil,” as realm of pure will to power, remains only counter-world (Gegenwelt) to Platonism > Nietzsche’s doctrine of “discipline and breeding (Zucht und Züchtung)” is extreme affirmation of morality > if will is evil, will to power is least of all beyond evil

HDG.EC.content: historiological reckoning a consequence of devastation, man rolls into nothing > nihilism only historically actual when abandonment of beings by being occurs: this abandonment still lets beings be [?] > Nietzsche did not grasp essence of nihilism, remained caught (gefangen) in it, his metaphysics prepares for complete, unconditional nihilism, belongs to process of devastation
HDG.EC.linkedContent: historiological reckoning a consequence of devastation, man rolls into nothing > nihilism only historically actual when abandonment of beings by being occurs: this abandonment still lets beings be [?] > Nietzsche did not grasp essence of nihilism, remained caught (gefangen) in it, his metaphysics prepares for complete, unconditional nihilism, belongs to process of devastation

HDG.EC.content: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being
HDG.EC.linkedContent: morally grounded world order will not ward off (gebannt) or end process of devastation > no matter the measures man takes, malice may remain Grundzug of Being

HDG.EC.content: [bringing 2 definitions of man together, thought & mortality, via attention & waiting] gathering toward the One of logos: something like attentiveness (Achtamsigkeit) prevails (waltet) > and isn’t attentiveness like the constant waiting on the pure coming > naturally this waiting essence remains unspoken [in both definitions]

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.EC.linkedContent: [bringing 2 definitions of man together, thought & mortality, via attention & waiting] gathering toward the One of logos: something like attentiveness (Achtamsigkeit) prevails (waltet) > and isn’t attentiveness like the constant waiting on the pure coming > naturally this waiting essence remains unspoken [in both definitions]

HDG.EC.content: freedom rests in being able to let, to let something be in that which it rests, so rare for man to let as such [so rare for man to be free] > this freedom alone true superiority (Überlegenheit), doesn’t need anything below it to remain above [Übermensch?]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: freedom rests in being able to let, to let something be in that which it rests, so rare for man to let as such [so rare for man to be free] > this freedom alone true superiority (Überlegenheit), doesn’t need anything below it to remain above [Übermensch?]

HDG.EC.content: national subjectivity remains in the international > international as mountain range, essential occurrence [das Wesende], of the national mountains
HDG.EC.linkedContent: national subjectivity remains in the international > international as mountain range, essential occurrence [das Wesende], of the national mountains

HDG.OHF.content: [Heidegger on modern forms of ontology vis phenomenology] only through phenomenology that ontology corresponding to it established on secure basis (sichere Problembasis): only in this manner that the consciousness-of-, the “of which (Wovon),” the object character of a being (der Gegenstandscharakter des Seienden) as such, becomes visible (sichtbar) > wide sense of phenomenology includes ontology > but, in such ontology, meaning of being (Seinssinn) never posed, unknown to it, genesis of meaning remains closed off to it > which field of Being is never asked
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [Heidegger on modern forms of ontology vis phenomenology] only through phenomenology that ontology corresponding to it established on secure basis (sichere Problembasis): only in this manner that the consciousness-of-, the “of which (Wovon),” the object character of a being (der Gegenstandscharakter des Seienden) as such, becomes visible (sichtbar) > wide sense of phenomenology includes ontology > but, in such ontology, meaning of being (Seinssinn) never posed, unknown to it, genesis of meaning remains closed off to it > which field of Being is never asked

HDG.OHF.content: character of being of care: absorbed (aufgeht) in its temporalization/actualization (Vollzug) > going about everyday dealings has character of carefreeness (Sorglosigkeit), world appears straightforward, self-evident, care is asleep: possibility remains that distress (Bedrängnis) will break forth in world > [Heidegger now racing to explain how curiosity (cura-curiositas!) doesn’t do away w/ self-evidence but reinforces it, thus care of curiosity covers itself up] > phenomenon of care, a fundamental phenomenon > (“I must break off here”)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: character of being of care: absorbed (aufgeht) in its temporalization/actualization (Vollzug) > going about everyday dealings has character of carefreeness (Sorglosigkeit), world appears straightforward, self-evident, care is asleep: possibility remains that distress (Bedrängnis) will break forth in world > [Heidegger now racing to explain how curiosity (cura-curiositas!) doesn’t do away w/ self-evidence but reinforces it, thus care of curiosity covers itself up] > phenomenon of care, a fundamental phenomenon > (“I must break off here”)
